divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside getting some air and something bright caught my eye.I knew it wasnot a plane or a planet.These objects have been seen on 3-4 occassions sinceDec.2003.Tonight I taped them again.There have been different witnesses.I camein the house got my camera and taped them on a hi-8 camcorder.I am alone hereright now and am afraid.Ive had period of waking paralysis the past couple ofnights.The local animals go nuts when these things are around.I would like todiscuss this with someone on the phone or in person.Please help
trends: There have been no other sightings in New Paris
This sighting has never been favorited.
